media:group.media:title: What if "Zootopia" was an anime (Preview) (4K)
media:group.media:description:

https://youtu.be/gPJVL7gtz4k

Based on the movie "Zootopia" by Walt Disney Animation Studios
  (http://movies.disney.com/zootopia)

Scene:
  Naturalist Club

Animation Process:
  https://youtu.be/scMeePtseBw

Fan Animation:
  Mike Inel (https://twitter.com/Mikeinelart)
Additional Ink+IB:
  Negyek (https://twitter.com/negyek)
Additional Colors:
  Procrastacat (http://procrastacat.tumblr.com)
  Negyek (https://twitter.com/negyek)

Artist Commentary:
Between "Gravity Falls", "Star vs the Forces of Evil", "Zootopia", and "Splatoon 2", people voted "Zootopia" as my next "What if ___ was an Anime" project!

The original is a thousand times better, of course. But we aim to fulfill our curiosity of seeing it in anime.
While we're only fan artists, we'll do our best to deliver this short fan animation well!

FAQ:
Q: When will it be done?
A: Considering it took us 4 months to get this far, I'm sure it will take more to finish the entire "Naturalist Club" scenes.
Q: Is it going to be uncensored?
A: Yes and no. Maybe. Perhaps.
